definition: Yan, a vassal state of Zhou in modern Hebei and Liaoning/north Hebei/the four Yan kingdoms of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Yan 前燕 (337-370), Later Yan 後燕|后燕 (384-409), Southern Yan 南燕 (398-410), Northern Yan 北燕 (409-436)/surname Yan

sentences.english: You will have all the oats and hay you want.
sentences.chinese: 你将得到你想要的燕麦和牧草。

sentences.english: We had to bring out the powerful Cheerio box to get her take the first step.
sentences.chinese: 我们就只有拿出燕麦圈，派托佳佳迈上第一步。
燕麦，亚麻籽，蓝莓和杏仁。

sentences.english: Oat bran was porphyrizd into cell-level ultramicro-power.
sentences.chinese: 正沿支气管蔓延的燕麦细胞癌。

sentences.english: This paper studied on oat oil from deshelled oat seeds by petroleum ether extraction.
sentences.chinese: 本课题以脱壳燕麦为原料，经石油醚提取得到燕麦油。

sentences.english: This paper studied on oat oil from deshelled oat seeds by petroleum ether extraction.
sentences.chinese: 本课题以脱壳燕麦为原料，经石油醚提取得到燕麦油。

sentences.english: He sows more wheat than oats.
sentences.chinese: 他的小麦种得比燕麦多。

sentences.english: Try oats with raisins, or barley with 100-percent fruit spread.
sentences.chinese: 尝试用燕麦加上葡萄干，或者百分百纯果酱自制早餐。

sentences.english: And three, I make the best oatmeal raisin cookies in the world.
sentences.chinese: 我从不说谎，三，我做的提子燕麦饼干是最好的。

sentences.english: Biaoxing 10% EC is a good herbicide of controlling Wild oat on spring wheat field.
sentences.chinese: 骠星EC是春小麦田防除野燕麦的优良除草剂。

sentences.english: Later, when he was recovering, she made him appetising cups of beef-tea or gruel.
sentences.chinese: 后来他病好，又拿牛肉茶或是燕麦粥给他开胃。

sentences.english: Oatmeal is another great staple for breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 燕麦片也是早餐必备食品。

sentences.english: The green green oat grass cover the ground.
Then, deliberately, he pours maple syrup into his oatmeal.
sentences.chinese: 然后，他又刻意往燕麦片粥里倒进枫糖浆。

sentences.english: Oat is an ancient crop originated from China, is widely planted in our country.
sentences.chinese: 燕麦是起源于我国一种古老作物，在我国广泛种植。

sentences.english: I add fresh milk to the oats and take them hot.
sentences.chinese: 我在燕麦片上加鲜奶，煮热了吃。

definition: grain crops other than rice and wheat
